name: Subtractive
description:
Subtractive is a 2D grid puzzle game where you can only move through walls you don't share a colour! (it makes more sense if you play it)

made for the Games Job Live Spring 2021 Game Jam!

The goal is to get to the end platform as a white cube through all 8 levels!

I would love to hear feedback! ♥

(warning this game is hard, and also has bright colours, so be careful!)
